name: df-mhp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6
body: |- wceq(cmhp, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cn0, crab(s3, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmpl, cv(s1))), wss(co(cv(s3), csupp, cfv(c0g, cv(s1))), crab(s4, crab(s5, co(cn0, cmap, cv(s0)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s5)), cn), cfn)), wceq(csu(s6, cn0, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s6))), cv(s2))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mHomP =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶ { s3 ‚àà(Base `(s0[mPoly]s1))|(s3[supp](0 ` s1))‚äÜ { s4 ‚àà { s5 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]s0)|(`' s5 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } | sum(s6 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(s4 ` s6))= s2 } }))
comment: Define the subspaces of order- ` n ` homogeneous polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
